brand.name: Tax Star
brand.primaryCTA: book a demo or start a free trial

facts.text: Tax Star provides AI-powered corporate tax software.
facts.evidence: Tax Star provides an AI-powered corporate tax software designed specifically for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: The software simplifies compliance with corporate tax regulations.
facts.evidence: It aims to simplify compliance with corporate tax regulations.

facts.text: The software offers tools for e-invoicing and Zakat calculations.
facts.evidence: alongside offering tools for e-invoicing and Zakat calculations for businesses in KSA.

facts.text: Automates tax returns and generates IFRS-compliant financial statements.
facts.evidence: Automates tax returns, generates IFRS-compliant financial statements.

facts.text: Sends smart reminders to ensure timely compliance.
facts.evidence: sends smart reminders to ensure timely compliance.

facts.text: Facilitates accurate and timely tax return completion.
facts.evidence: Facilitates accurate and timely tax return completion.

facts.text: Streamlines the creation of financial statements.
facts.evidence: Streamlines the creation of financial statements, reducing reliance on manual processes.

facts.text: Alerts users about upcoming document expirations.
facts.evidence: Alerts users about upcoming document expirations to avoid penalties.

facts.text: Saves up to 40% of time on tax calculations.
facts.evidence: Saves up to 40% of time on tax calculations.

facts.text: Enables teams to concentrate on higher-value tasks.
facts.evidence: enabling teams to concentrate on higher-value tasks.

facts.text: Users can manage 30-40% more clients without increasing staff.
facts.evidence: Users can manage 30-40% more clients without increasing staff.

facts.text: Eliminates manual calculations and potential penalties.
facts.evidence: By eliminating manual calculations and potential penalties.

facts.text: Businesses can save both time and money.
facts.evidence: businesses can save both time and money.

facts.text: Seamlessly integrates with existing ERP systems.
facts.evidence: Seamlessly integrates with existing ERP systems for enhanced workflow.

facts.text: Provides comprehensive tracking of changes and compliance activities.
facts.evidence: Provides comprehensive tracking of changes and compliance activities.

facts.text: Target customers include accounting practice owners, tax advisors, and ERP resellers.
facts.evidence: Target Customers: Accounting practice owners, Tax advisors, ERP resellers.

facts.text: Use cases include corporate tax calculations and practice management.
facts.evidence: Use Cases: Corporate tax calculations, Internal and client approvals, Financial statement production, Practice management and deadline tracking.

facts.text: E-Invoicing ensures compliance with FTA regulations.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing (UAE): Ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations.

facts.text: Zakat calculations are aligned with compliance reporting.
facts.evidence: Zakat for Business (KSA): Facilitates Zakat calculations aligned with compliance reporting.

facts.text: Tax Star is tailored for businesses in the UAE and KSA.
facts.evidence: particularly tailored for businesses operating in the UAE and KSA.
